description:
Atago Hiroe is a third year at Himematsu High, plays lieutenant position. Captain of the Himematsu High`s mahjong team. She has amazing self confidence and the skill to back it up. She is the ace player and one of the few people that can go up against Shiratodai. Known as the "Trap Master" and uses bluff to manipulate the opponent into unwillingly playing into her big hands. She is considered one of the best players despite not having any special abilities whatsoever as she`s able to consistently win with big hands and are able to counteract other strategies against her.
Source: Wiki
name: Atago Hiroe
